name: Cbjs3d
body:
### Cardboard javascript 3d library
The Cardboard Javascript 3d Library is being developed to easy implementation of 3d images and others (like landscapes) in the web.
The current version is 0.1Alpha. New updates will be published soon.

### Use:
Create a html basic webpage (with head, title and body ...). Create, style and name with a id a div where you want. Choose, for example, a landscape and add this to the head of the page:

`<script languaje="JavaScript" src="cbjs3d.js"></script>
<script languaje="JavaScript">
window.onload = function(){
	Cbjs3d({
		div: "divElement",
		type: "landscape",
		image: "image.jpg",
		view: 360
	});
};
</script>`


### Documentation
Documentation will be done soon.

### Authors and Contributors
Author @pelusito

### Support or Contact
This project is now being developed. It HAVE errors, optimization troubles, etc. If you want to say something about that, please contact me via [help](http:///) and I'll help you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
